details: Created project configuration with all dependencies: FastAPI, Meilisearch, RustworkX, Tree-sitter, sentence-transformers, pytest, etc.
Meilisearch v1.6 with vector search enabled, persistent volume, health check configured
Environment template with all configuration sections: App, API, Meilisearch, Embedding, Graph, Indexing, Cache, Performance
Created full directory structure with 12 __init__.py files for all modules: api, core, utils, parsing, graph, embedding, search, indexing, rag
Pydantic Settings with 8 config sections: App, API, Meilisearch, Embedding, Graph, Indexing, Cache, Performance. Includes validators and cached get_settings()
Custom exception hierarchy: SmartSearchError base, ConfigurationError, SearchError, GraphError, ParsingError, EmbeddingError, IndexingError, RAGError with to_dict() for API responses
Structlog configuration with dev/prod modes, get_logger(), LogContext context manager, bind/unbind/clear context helpers

task: Tạo API router và health endpoints
details: Health endpoints: /health (basic), /health/ready (with Meilisearch check), /health/live (liveness probe). Router with /api/v1 prefix
FastAPI app with lifespan, CORS middleware, exception handlers, create_app factory, uvicorn runner

task: Tạo test infrastructure và chạy tests
details: Created 5 test files with 101 tests. All tests PASSED. Coverage: 97.34% (exceeded 85% requirement)
Phase 1 Foundation completed successfully. 101 tests passed, 97.34% coverage. Ready for Phase 2: AST Parsing
Data models: Language enum, Position, Span, Parameter, CodeUnitType, CodeUnit, ParsedFile, CodeChunk dataclasses with serialization
TreeSitterParser with multi-language support, parse_source(), parse_file(), register_extractor(), import/docstring extraction
CodeChunker for embedding-size chunks, SmartChunker for semantic boundary splitting, context preservation, overlap handling
PythonExtractor: functions, classes, methods, parameters (*args, **kwargs, typed defaults), decorators, docstrings, function calls extraction
Created 4 test files: test_models.py (26 tests), test_tree_sitter_parser.py (16 tests), test_python_extractor.py (18 tests), test_chunker.py (17 tests)
Added handling for typed_default_parameter AST node (parameters with both type annotation AND default value like 'b: int = 0')
Phase 2 AST Parsing completed successfully. 77 tests passed, 87.94% coverage. Ready for Phase 3: Graph Engine
Graph data models: NodeType, EdgeType enums, NodeData, EdgeData, GraphNode, GraphEdge, TraversalOptions, PathResult, SubgraphResult, GraphStats, ImpactAnalysisResult
CodeGraph class using RustworkX: add/remove nodes/edges, traversal, path finding, subgraph extraction, statistics, serialization
GraphBuilder: build from CodeUnits, handle parent-child, inheritance, call relationships, import edges
GraphAlgorithms: find callers/callees, ancestors/descendants, impact analysis, centrality calculation, cycle detection, dead code detection
GraphPersistence: save/load JSON, compressed JSON, incremental with metadata. GraphCache: LRU cache for graphs
Created 5 test files: test_models.py (30 tests), test_engine.py (40 tests), test_builder.py (13 tests), test_algorithms.py (21 tests), test_persistence.py (20 tests)
Phase 3 Graph Engine completed successfully. 124 tests passed, 87.69% coverage. Ready for Phase 4: Embedding Pipeline
